docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows an enlargement of a section of skin to highlight an individual sweat gland. The gland then expels sweat onto the surface of skin.
docs.snippet: This animation shows an enlargement of a section of skin to highlight an individual sweat gland. The gland then expels sweat onto the surface of skin.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation begins with a top view of the tongue then magnifies and shows two individual taste buds detecting taste molecules. The various taste centers (bitter, sour, sweet, and salty) are highlighted on the tongue.
docs.snippet: This animation begins with a top view of the tongue then magnifies and shows two individual taste buds detecting taste molecules. The various taste centers (bitter, sour, sweet, and salty) are highlighted on the tongue.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a general overview, the formation and passage of urine through the various components of the urinary system is shown. Enlarged areas include the kidney, sectioned kidney, nephrons, renal corpuscle, and passage of particles and red blood cells within.
docs.snippet: In a general overview, the formation and passage of urine through the various components of the urinary system is shown. Enlarged areas include the kidney, sectioned kidney, nephrons, renal corpuscle, and passage of particles and red blood cells...

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the process of red blood cell formation and the components that comprise blood.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the process of red blood cell formation and the components that comprise blood.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation defines normal blood pressure and the measurement of systole and diastole. Structures shown include a front-view of the heart beating, a cut-view of the heart beating, and blood flowing through a small artery.
docs.snippet: This animation defines normal blood pressure and the measurement of systole and diastole. Structures shown include a front-view of the heart beating, a cut-view of the heart beating, and blood flowing through a small artery.

docs.lead_paragraph: In an enlarged view of a cut section of a small artery, this animation shows a vaccine injection and follows the path of its antigens, initiating the body's development of antibodies.
docs.snippet: In an enlarged view of a cut section of a small artery, this animation shows a vaccine injection and follows the path of its antigens, initiating the body's development of antibodies.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation demonstrates how an ultrasound identifies the solid and hollow areas of structures within a fetus.
docs.snippet: This animation demonstrates how an ultrasound identifies the solid and hollow areas of structures within a fetus.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the cycle of blood circulation through the heart, arteries, veins, and lungs within the body.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the cycle of blood circulation through the heart, arteries, veins, and lungs within the body.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation depicts the process of blood clotting in an enlarged view of a small artery. Cells shown include red blood cells, platelets, fibrin, and clotting factors.
docs.snippet: This animation depicts the process of blood clotting in an enlarged view of a small artery. Cells shown include red blood cells, platelets, fibrin, and clotting factors.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation gives a general comparison between anaerobic exercise (lifting weights) and aerobic exercise (jogging).
docs.snippet: This animation gives a general comparison between anaerobic exercise (lifting weights) and aerobic exercise (jogging).
